name: Ball And Icosahedron Love
description:
Help the ball reach the icosahedron by dragging and placing the bumpers that spawn on the left. The ball also likes to mingle, so the more times it bounces before reaching the icosahedron, the highest your score will be.

  • If the ball is stuck and restarting the game is too drastic, press 🅱 to have it be born again at the top.
  • Press D access a super secret debugging menu that is useful only to me! 😲

This is a work in progress,  please report bugs, give feedback and suggest features.

This project is free and open source
https://github.com/otrapersona/myproject1
